title: DEFAULT BLACK IN ILLUSTRATOR?
content:
for some reason the black in the standard color pallette in CS# is only about 90% black.

how do I change it?

anyone else have this problem?

 [‹ What's you're favorite slab serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121164658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49556 "Go to previous forum topic") [Favourite magazines with custom type design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121164658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50186 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredcastle

comments.content:
double click the swatch and change the colour to 100% black.

or are you talking about printing? if you want true black when printing go with 30/30/30/100.
If you go into the swatch, is it truely 90% black, or does it only look like that? Since a CMYK black will in alot of cases not look like 100% black _on screen_.

Go to Preferences \> Appearance of Black and change the settings to the version you prefer/need.

Tim
